urls.title: Case report: £505k in fines and costs following pollution at
urls.description: On Friday 3 February 2017, Suez Recycling and Recovery UK Limited (previously trading as SITA UK Limited) was ordered to pay £505,000 by Truro Crown Court following a series of offences at the Connon Bridge landfill site, near Liskeard. After pleading guilty, Suez was fined £180,000 for six offences under the Environmental Permitting (England and Wales) Regulations 2010. These

tweets.text:
The landfill protestors have filed into Queen’s Gardens in Newcastle town centre. 
 
They’d protesting about the smell surrounding Walleys Quarry in Silverdale https://t.co/BLQ4jgCA0S

Each UK farm can expect only 1 @EnvAgency inspection every 263 years: Devastating report out today by @SalmonTroutCons on the collapse and defunding of agri pollution enforcement in the UK https://t.co/R3l3xsAV8B

We saw you curtain twitching Nigel @RedIndustries2 Too ashamed to face the crowds and say sorry or too arrogant? You can walk away as a more respected man if you face this honestly, say sorry, turn it around & then walk away @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink @EnvAgency https://t.co/VSOj9silZX

We’d like to say ‘thank you’ to those who took part in the Walleys Quarry protest today for the way it was carried out. It was well-organised, socially-distanced and respectful. https://t.co/zZhsqoA1ud

@SianieRoo @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @PHE_EoEngland @JamesBevanEA @Cap_it_off All are equally at fault , the law needs tightening up and communities should have better ways of holding regulators and the regulated to account .

Don’t know who is worse - the perpetrators @RedIndustries2 or the regulators who have allowed it to happen & should have known better @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @PHE_EoEngland @JamesBevanEA #stopthestink  @Cap_it_off https://t.co/ryOOAeuT2B
Proud of our community, fantastic turn out @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/HLtL2jub0Z

@SianieRoo @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe 4 more sleeps, well no sleep cos filthy stench keeping us up, then blissful fresh air, no headaches, stingy eyes, no nausea or lethargy, no waking up in middle of night to house full of toxic gas, can't wait @ClareDinnisEA your time to prove you #stopthestink
@RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @PHE_EoEngland We will not stop until you STOP THE STINK! @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/LTP1oR58SV

@EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA  @JamesBevanEA  @AaronBell4NUL  Can anybody justify why Clayton Hall landfill site was closed down with these numbers of complaints, when #WalleysQuarry received 10430 in a recent 6 week period? Plenty more facts where these came from...
#StopTheStink https://t.co/Z0G6tFVYc4
@helenafmckeown @FarmersOfTheUK @NFUtweets @FarmersWeekly @NFFNUK @FarmingUK @FarmWildlifeUK @SoilAssociation @EnvAgency @friends_earth @LGSpace @Greenhouse_PR Driest April since 1938!?

Is anyone talking about the fact that we’ve not seen any significant rain in most parts of England & Wales for ... six weeks or more?? @FarmersOfTheUK @NFUtweets @FarmersWeekly @NFFNUK @FarmingUK @FarmWildlifeUK @SoilAssociation @EnvAgency @friends_earth @LGSpace @Greenhouse_PR

Well said - it’s fetid and people should not be exposed to this utter filth particularly not regularly! @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland @ClareDinnisEA @MattHancock @MPGeorgeEustice @JamesBevanEA #stopthestink @Cap_it_off https://t.co/qODaNZIbAi

Reported hydrogen sulphide on ward 205 at Royal Stoke hospital. Woke me up, which is wonderful when in slow labour 🙌🏻   @UHNM_NHS @PHE_uk @PHE_WestMids @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency
